3PC.F.summary: Cementir Holding N.V., through its subsidiaries, provides cement and ready-mixed concrete in the Nordic and Baltic, Belgium, North America, Turkey, Egypt, Asia Pacific, Italy and internationally. The company offers white cement for architectural, aesthetic, and structural applications; grey cement for the construction industry; ready-mix concrete for use in infrastructure, landscaping, industry and agriculture, energy and environment, buildings, and pre-stressed and prefabricated concrete products; and aggregates, such as natural sand, gravel, and crushed stones. It also provides Aalborg Extreme, a premixed concrete for thin concrete products production; Aalborg Excel, a ready-to-use mortar for sophisticated aesthetics used for glass fiber concrete; Aalborg Explore, a ready-to-use mortar; and FUTURECEM cement. In addition, the company purchases and sells clinker, replacement parts, pet-coke and coal fuels, and other products; and offers shipping and logistics services, procurement management services, assistance and technical support, goods forwarding, and digital solutions. Cementir Holding N.V. was incorporated in 1947 and is headquartered in Rome, Italy.

7P6.F.summary: Panariagroup Industrie Ceramiche S.p.A. produces and sells ceramic tiles for floors and wall coverings in Italy and internationally. It is also involved in the production of porcelain stoneware products; and retail sale of ceramic tiles. The company sells its products under the Panaria Ceramica, Lea Ceramiche, Cotto d'Este, Fiordo, Blustyle, Florida Tile, Margres, Love Tiles, and Bellissimo brands. It primarily focuses on the high-end and luxury market segment. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Fiorano Modenese, Italy. Panariagroup Industrie Ceramiche S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Finpanaria S.p.A.

88K.F.summary: Directa Plus Plc manufactures and sells graphene-based products for industrial and commercial applications in Italy and internationally. It operates through Textile, Environmental, and Others segments. The company offers its products under the G+ brand name. Its products are used in elastomers, textiles, composite materials, wastewater treatment, oil-spill recovery, golf balls, and foot wear. The company is based in Lomazzo, Italy.

BZU.MI.summary: Buzzi Unicem S.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and sells cement, ready-mix concrete, and natural aggregates. It offers construction hydraulic binders for making plasters and masonry works on site. The company has operations in Italy, the United States, Germany, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Poland, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Ukraine, Russia, Mexico, and Brazil. Buzzi Unicem S.p.A. was founded in 1907 and is based in Casale Monferrato, Italy.

CALT.MI.summary: Caltagirone SpA, through its subsidiaries, engages in the cement, real estate, finance, and publishing activities. The company is based in Rome, Italy. Caltagirone SpA is a subsidiary of Finanziaria Italia 2005 Spa.

DTPKF.summary: Directa Plus Plc manufactures and sells graphene-based products for industrial and commercial applications in Italy and internationally. Its products are used in elastomers, textiles, composite materials, wastewater treatment, oil-spill recovery, golf balls, and foot wear. The company is based in Lomazzo, Italy.

ICF.MI.summary: Industrie Chimiche Forestali S.p.A. designs, manufactures, and markets adhesives and fabrics for automotive, footwear, leather goods, upholstered furniture, flexible, and industrial packaging markets in Italy. The company markets its products under the Industrie Chimiche Forestali, ABC - Adhesive Based Chemicals, and Durabond brands. It also exports its products to approximately 60 countries around the world. The company was formerly known as Forestali S.r.l. and changed its name to Industrie Chimiche Forestali S.p.A. in October 2006. Industrie Chimiche Forestali S.p.A. was founded in 1918 and is based in Milan, Italy.

IKG.MI.summary: Intek Group S.p.A. produces and sells semi-finished copper and copper-alloy products in Europe and internationally. The company is also involved in the alternative energy, private equity, and real estate businesses. It offers products for maritime use and tube bundles. The company was formerly known as KME Group S.p.A. and changed its name to Intek Group S.p.A. in November 2012. Intek Group S.p.A. was founded in 1886 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

IKGR.MI.summary: Intek Group S.p.A. produces and sells semi-finished copper and copper-alloy products in Europe and internationally. The company is also involved in the alternative energy, private equity, and real estate businesses. It offers products for maritime use and tube bundles. The company was formerly known as KME Group S.p.A. and changed its name to Intek Group S.p.A. in November 2012. Intek Group S.p.A. was founded in 1886 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

ISG.MI.summary: Isagro S.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, manufacturing, marketing, and distribution of agro pharmaceuticals products for crop protection and nutrition in Europe, Asia, North America, and South America. Its products include fungicides, insecticides, microorganisms, biostimulants, pheromones, and fumigants. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy. Isagro S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Holdisa S.r.l.

ISGS.MI.summary: Isagro S.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, manufacturing, marketing, and distribution of agro pharmaceuticals products for crop protection and nutrition in Europe, Asia, North America, and South America. Isagro S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Holdisa S.r.l.

MTJ3.F.summary: Intek Group S.p.A. produces and sells semi-finished copper and copper-alloy products in Europe and internationally. The company is also involved in the alternative energy, private equity, and real estate businesses. It offers products for maritime use and tube bundles. The company was formerly known as KME Group S.p.A. and changed its name to Intek Group S.p.A. in November 2012. Intek Group S.p.A. was founded in 1886 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

NDT.MI.summary: Neodecortech S.p.A. produces and markets decorative papers for industrial sectors in Italy, Europe, Asia, the United States, and internationally. The company offers printed decorative papers, printed and melamine-impregnated papers, and finish-foils primarily for the furniture, laminate flooring, and camper/caravan segments under the Confalonieri brand; and paper-based laminates for covering, door, and surface segments under the Texte brand. It also provides plastic printed films and plastic printed laminated films for LVT flooring under the Plana. The company was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Filago, Italy.

PAN.MI.summary: Panariagroup Industrie Ceramiche S.p.A. produces and sells ceramic tiles for floors and wall coverings in Italy and internationally. It is also involved in the production of porcelain stoneware products; and retail sale of ceramic tiles. The company sells its products under the Panaria Ceramica, Lea Ceramiche, Cotto d'Este, Fiordo, Blustyle, Florida Tile, Margres, Love Tiles, and Bellissimo brands. It primarily focuses on the high-end and luxury market segment. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Fiorano Modenese, Italy. Panariagroup Industrie Ceramiche S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Finpanaria S.p.A.

QCG.SG.summary: Caltagirone SpA, through its subsidiaries, engages in the cement, real estate, finance, and publishing activities. The company is based in Rome, Italy. Caltagirone SpA is a subsidiary of Finanziaria Italia 2005 Spa.

QOL.SG.summary: SOL S.p.A. engages in the applied research, production, and distribution of industrial, pure, and medicinal gases; and in door-to-door medical care and related medical equipment in Italy and internationally. It offers technical and medical gases, including oxygen, nitrogen, argon, hydrogen, carbon dioxide, acetylene, nitrous oxide, gas mixtures, high purity gases, food gases, and gaseous and liquid helium, as well as synthetic and compressed air; gas for electronics; ammonia and combustible gases for industrial use; gases and gas mixtures for respiratory and therapeutic, and diagnostic and instrumental use; and special gases and gas mixtures. The company also provides services, apparatus, and products for home oxygen therapy, home mechanical ventilation, home artificial feeding, and home treatment of bed sores; home treatment services for nocturnal apnoea syndrome; and integrated homecare services. In addition, it produces hydroelectric power; and engages in the exploration and identification, design, construction, and running of hydroelectric power stations connected to the national high tension distribution network. Further, the company designs, constructs, and manages bio banks, cell factories, and centers for processing and conserving cells and tissues; offers pre-and post-natal diagnostic services; and produces and sells diagnostic systems and services. Additionally, it is involved in the GMP production of monoclonal antibodies and recombinant proteins; and scientific, pre-clinical, and clinical research of biological pharmaceuticals, as well as the provision of transport and biological sample conservation services for third parties. SOL S.p.A. products are used in the chemical, electronics, iron and steel, engineering, and foodstuff industries, as well as in environmental protection, and research and health sectors. The company was founded in 1927 and is headquartered in Monza, Italy. SOL S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Gas and Technologies World BV.

RDM.MC.summary: Reno De Medici S.p.A. produces and distributes carton boards primarily in Italy, Portugal, Spain, Germany, France, and Internationally. The company operates through White Lined Chipboard, Folding Box Board, and Specialties segments. It offers coated recycled carton boards; folding virgin fiber carton boards; carton boards for specialties and luxury packaging; and specialty board for luxury packaging and publishing industry. The company also offers various forms of carton boards, such as Vincicoat, Serviliner, Vinciliner, Vinciflexo, Flexoliner, Rochcoat, Hermicoat, Rochblanc, Rochcoat Blanc, Rochfreeze, Rochperle, Blanc II Grey, Hermiwhite, Hermikraft, Vinciavana, Vincibright, Vincibright Special, Vinciwhite, Triplex Blanco, Triplex Gris, Triplex Gris EB, and Triplex Madera. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy. Reno De Medici S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Cascades Inc.

RM.MI.summary: Reno De Medici S.p.A. produces and distributes carton boards primarily in Italy, Portugal, Spain, Germany, France, and Internationally. The company operates through White Lined Chipboard, Folding Box Board, and Specialties segments. It offers coated recycled carton boards; folding virgin fiber carton boards; carton boards for specialties and luxury packaging; and specialty board for luxury packaging and publishing industry. SICT.MI.summary: SICIT Group S.p.A. manufactures and sells amino acid and peptide-based fertilizers for agriculture and plaster industries in Italy. The company provides biostimulants in liquid and powder form; and retarders for plaster and plasterboard under the PlastRetard brand. It operates in the agrochemical and industrial sectors. The company also exports its products to approximately 90 countries. SICIT Group S.p.A. was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Chiampo, Italy.
